title: SINGLE OFFICE STRUCTURE AND FUNCTION
content:
Ord. 031211-42.

The single office has the duties and powers prescribed by this title relating to the
approval of subdivisions, exercised in accordance with Section 30-1-93 (Single Office Structure And Function).

Source: Based on City Code Chapter 25-1, Article 3 (Accountable Entities); Ord. 031211-11;
